action.des: Chicago Cubs pitcher Matt Garza left the game due to an injured arm.

atbat.des: David Freese singles on a soft ground ball to third baseman Luis Valbuena.
atbat.des_es: David Freese pega sencillo con rodado suave a tercera base Luis Valbuena.

pitch.cc: Justin Germano had David Freese down 0-2 but could not put him away.

atbat.des: Skip Schumaker triples (3) on a fly ball to right fielder Bryan LaHair. Allen Craig scores. Rafael Furcal scores.

pitch.cc: James Russell may prefer to go after Skip Schumaker, whose OPS is .796 this season, with the cutter rather than facing Matt Holliday, whose OPS is .914.
